Join us and discover how high your career can soar at Collins Aerospace.Primary Responsibilities:Act as point of contact for a subset of classified labs for; hardware, operating systems, and engineering software tools supportDrive software & tools escalations to resolution by taking the lead as coordinator and pulling in multiple stakeholder groupsDeploy & maintain secure compute environment for classified labsImplements security controls for systems as directed by Security ManagerInfrastructure systems tier 1 supportExecutes life-cycle upgrades (hardware & operating systems)Computer hardware; install, move, add, change, and deinstallBasic Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree and 3 years of relevant experience ORIn absence of a degree, 7 years of relevant experience is requiredMust be a U.S. CitizenMust have a US Department of Defense (DoD) security clearance.Preferred Qualifications:Security+ Certification or ability to obtain within first 30 days of employment 3+years of experiencein customer service 2+ years of experience supporting engineering software tools such as; Jira, Confluence, Fisheye, Bamboo, and Jama (preferred but not required)Linux Systems/Server Administration (preferred but not required)Experience administering Active Directory (preferredbut not required)CISSP (preferred but not required)RMF (Risk Management Framework) & other security frameworks such as DFARSInformation Technology desktop hardware and compute infrastructureGeneral knowledge of computer software General knowledge of Engineering softwareCollins Aerospace, a Raytheon Technologies company, is a leader in technologically advanced and intelligent solutions for the global aerospace and defense industry. Collins Aerospace has the capabilities, comprehensive portfolio and expertise to solve customers’ toughest challenges and to meet the demands of a rapidly evolving global market.Do you want to be a part of something bigger?
